articles.description: England's hopes of emulating 2019's shock win were dashed by errors and their enduring habit of fading out of second halves.
articles.title: Ireland 27-22 England: Steve Borthwick plan crumbles in Dublin

articles.description: BBC Scotland assess how Huw Jones' try-scoring ability made the difference for Gregor Townsend's side in their Six Nations opener.
articles.title: Six Nations 2025: Huw Jones makes the difference for Scotland against Italy

articles.description: Liverpool are nine points clear in the Premier League and cleared their latest hurdle with a battling win over an impressive Bournemouth side.
articles.title: Liverpool pass 'tough challenge' with flying colours

articles.description: Just a couple of weeks ago, David Moyes said he "can't magician" Everton to some goals but the manager is waving his wand again in his second spell at Goodison Park.
articles.title: Everton 4-0 Leicester: David Moyes casts spell at Goodison Park

articles.description: Arsenal welcome Manchester City to Emirates Stadium on Sunday in the sides' first meeting since their dramatic 2-2 draw in September.
articles.title: Arsenal v Man City: Rivals face each for first time since Erling Haaland's 'stay humble' comment

articles.description: Follow live text commentary, score updates and match stats from Espanyol vs Real Madrid in the Spanish La Liga
articles.title: Espanyol vs Real Madrid: Spanish La Liga stats & head-to-head

articles.description: West Ham boss Graham Potter says getting sacked by Chelsea was "maybe the best thing that happened to me".
articles.title: Chelsea v West Ham: Hammers boss Graham Potter has no ill feeling after Blues sack

articles.description: Captain Caelan Doris says Ireland "showed what we are capable of" as they start their quest for a third straight Six Nations title with a bonus-point win over England.
articles.title: Ireland 27-22 England: Irish showed what we're capable of, says captain Caelan Doris

articles.description: Matheus Cunha wraps up Wolves' win against Aston Villa, then hints in his goal celebration that he is staying after being linked with a move away.
articles.title: Matheus Cunha: Forward hints he is staying at Wolves with goal celebration

articles.description: Chris Wood scores a hat-trick as Nottingham Forest deliver an emphatic response to last weekend's 5-0 defeat at Bournemouth by thrashing Brighton at the City Ground.
articles.title: Nottingham Forest 7-0 Brighton: Chris Wood hat-trick helps hosts thump Seagulls
